observation:
[{'url': 'https://www.energysage.com/energy-management/best-systems/', 'content': "Choosing the right energy management system for you
The actual value of each individual system will vary based on factors like whether you already have solar and storage, if your current electrical panel needs to be replaced, if you live in an area with time-of-use rates, or how big your storage system is in relation to your energy needs. Generally, if you're looking to add solar or other electrical upgrades, you'll need to have a 200 amp panel to accommodate the solar and storage (or EV charger and ASHP) and a replacement will likely cost you anywhere from $1,000 to $3,000 –\xa0in this case, you might opt for an energy management system that fully replaces your electrical panel.
 The following companies all offer complete energy management systems and are some of the major leaders in the industry:
Span
Founded by a former Tesla engineer, Span is a relatively new startup company that has made big waves in the energy management industry since the launch of their first Smart Panel in late 2019. Span & Schneider Electric
Adds on to your electrical panel: Lumin & Generac
Doesn't include a smart panel: Emporia
Stackable: Span & Lumin
The first thing you'll want to consider when deciding on an energy management system is the type of setup you're looking for. Integration of energy devices
Product agnostic (more flexible, less accurate): Schneider Electric & Lumin
Product specific (less flexible, more accurate): Span, Generac, & Emporia
Odds are that if you're considering an energy management system, you also have or are considering other electrical devices that you'll want to easily integrate with your system."}, {'url': 'https://controltrends.org/hvac-smart-building-controls/controltrends-news/featured/08/building-automation-controls-systems-reviews-kmc-controls/', 'content': 'The KMC Commander, the flagship product offered by KMC Controls, is a cutting-edge building management system designed to streamline and enhance the control and monitoring of various systems within a facility. With its advanced features and user-friendly interface, Commander is a powerful tool for facility managers seeking to optimize energy ...'}, {'url': 'https://www.chamberofcommerce.com/business-directory/pennsylvania/allentown/heating-equipment-supplier/2000855871-energy-equipment-controls', 'content': 'Energy Equipment & Controls is located at 974 Marcon Blvd Suite 120 in Allentown, Pennsylvania 18109. Energy Equipment & Controls can be contacted via phone at 610-437-9818 for pricing, hours and directions.'}, {'url': 'https://www.yelp.com/biz/energy-equipment-and-control-inc-allentown', 'content': 'Specialties: Energy Equipment & Control, Inc., located in Allentown, PA, provides products and systems tailored for your business and your individual needs. The basis of the company is built on the following principles: accurate service, complete system designs, national delivery in a timely manner, automated building solutions, technical assistance, and more. We offer job-site surveys, as ...'}, {'url': 'https://www.trustpilot.com/review/energycontrol.com', 'content': 'Ordering was smooth, but the manufacturer sent the wrong product. EGT was quick to resolve the issue, and I appreciate the fast response as I had a deadline for the project and it was able to be met. Date of experience: March 15, 2023. Useful. Share. Reply from Energy Control Technologies, Inc. Apr 5, 2023.'}]
